articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praises Huichon Power Station Builders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praises Huichon Power Station Builders
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Jan. 7 sent a letter of special thanks to all the builders of the Huichon Power Station for having fully demonstrated the spirit of Songun Korea in its construction.
					Expressing sincere gratitude to all the builders for having displayed the spirit of Songun Korea before the world by bringing about great innovations and leap forward in the construction of the power station, the letter said:
					
					The construction of the Huichon Power Station is a sacred drive for carrying out the behest of President Kim Il Sung and a gigantic nature-remaking project of weighty significance in opening the gate to a thriving nation. 
					
					I issued an order to complete the Huichon Power Station by the year 2012, the centenary of birth of the President, for the purpose of fulfilling the above-said behest and reinforcing the nation's power bases and took a revolutionary step for dynamically pushing forward the construction through the general mobilization of the whole Party and army and all the people. 
					
					The soldier-builders and all other builders who rushed to the construction sites in hearty response to my order fully displayed the revolutionary soldier spirit and the revolutionary spirit of fortitude, thereby opening up a bright prospect of completing in a matter of two or three years the large-scale construction of the power station which would take more than 10 years at an ordinary pace. 
					
					Officials and working people at the related units produced and supplied necessary materials and equipment in good time in a responsible manner, deeply aware of the importance and significance of the said construction, thus making a positive contribution to hastening the projects. 
					
					At present families of servicemen are conducting brisk agitation for successes in the construction sites and giving strong helping hands to the builders after forming families' squads for agitation and groups of helpers and the whole Party and army and all the people are sincerely helping the builders of the power station materially and morally. This is very good and herein lie the might of the Workersâ€™ Party of Korea and the advantages of Korean-style socialism. 
					
					Leap forward and innovations are effected at the construction sites every minute and second and the speed created at the construction sites of the Huichon Power Station represents the "Huichon Speed", a new Chollima speed in the era of Songun based on the revolutionary soldier spirit. 
					
					The "Huichon Speed" means the speed of the charge by the heroic Korean People's Army with which it breaks through any impregnable fortress by way of blitz, flying high the Flag of the Supreme Commander and a speed for each to become a match for a hundred. It is a speed representing the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people who breathe the same breath and keep pace with the headquarters of the revolution in the forced march and the speed created thanks to the unity between the army and the people. It also represents the speed of great advance of Songun Korea dashing ahead like the wind toward a thriving nation, racing against the time, and the speed for making a great leap forward.
					
					Looking round the construction sites of the power station, I clearly witnessed once again the spirit of the heroic KPA, the spirit of Korea. This helped reinforce my conviction that the great drive for building a thriving nation is sure to triumph as long as there are the army and people possessed of this revolutionary spirit. 
					
					I am very satisfied with the fact that all the service personnel and builders involved in the construction of the power station are powerfully encouraging the whole Party and army and all the people in the drive for effecting a great surge by advancing at the "Huichon Speed", a new Chollima speed, in the van of the grand campaign for building a thriving nation with intense loyalty to the Party and the revolution and ardent patriotism. I highly appreciate your heroic feats.
					
					It is the steadfast resolution and will of the Party to finish without fail the construction of the power station by the year 2012, the centenary of birth of the President. 
					
					It is a very difficult and Herculean task to wind up the construction of the power station in a matter of two or three years but it is quite possible to complete it in time through the great offensive waged by the whole Party and army and all the people as long as there are the inexhaustible strength of the army and people single-mindedly united behind the Party and the strong foundation of the Juche-oriented industry. 
					
					It is my firm belief that all the service personnel and builders participating in the construction of the power station will devotedly carry out my order to complete its construction by the year 2012 and thus become the first to open the gate to a thriving nation.

articles.title: DPRK Warns S. Korea to Stop Scattering Leaflets
articles.content:
DPRK Warns S. Korea to Stop Scattering Leaflets
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The head of the north side's delegation to the north-south military working talks sent a notice to the military authorities of the south side Wednesday warning the south Korean authorities against the scattering of anti-DPRK leaflets which slander the DPRK and stoke distrust and confrontation between fellow countrymen. The following is the gist of the notice:  
					 The north side on Oct. 31 last year took note of the daily escalating scattering of leaflets by the authorities of the south side and seriously warned that unless they take necessary measures to stop it, this will adversely affect the north-south relations beyond imagination. 
					
					 They, however, scattered leaflets in the area of Kimhwa County, the area of Jangphung County and the area of Mt. Kumgang tourist zone and other areas of the north side using balloons at the end of last year and the beginning of this year.
					
					 What merits special attention is that the People's Alliance for Sending Leaflets to the North made up of ultra-right conservative organizations scattered hundreds of thousands of leaflets over areas of the north side from Rimjin House in Phaju City, Kyonggi Province even on Jan. 1, seized by anti-communist hysteria.
					
					 The north side cannot but take a serious view of the provocative scattering of leaflets and anti-DPRK ruckus perpetrated by the authorities of the south side, pushing the inter-Korean relations to the phase of confrontation behind the scene, while paying lip-service to "dialogue" and "improved relations."
					
					 The army of the DPRK will never tolerate even the slightest acts of hurting the unchallenged prestige of the headquarters of the DPRK and defiling the dignity of its socialist homeland no matter how dear and urgent the improvement of the inter-Korean relations is.
					
					 The authorities of the south side should admit that their scattering of anti-DPRK leaflets is little short of openly scrapping the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and a treason quite contrary to the requirements of the times and the desire of the nation and take measures to immediately disband the ultra-right conservative organizations that committed the above-said crime and severely punish its chief culprits.
					
					 The separatists at home and abroad will never be able to flee from a stern punishment by the nation for challenging history.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Equatorial Guinea Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Equatorial Guinea Ambassador
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Narciso Ntugu Abeso Oyana, ambassador of Equatorial Guinea to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him Wednesday.

articles.title: 14th Kimjongilia Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
14th Kimjongilia Festival to Be Held
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The 14th Kimjongilia Festival will take place in Pyongyang on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The festival, to be opened at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition in mid-February Juche 99 (2010), will be participated in by armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons, working people of different strata, school youth and children, overseas compatriots' organizations and overseas compatriots and friends of different countries.
					
					 Immortal flower shows and visits to the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia hothouses are expected to take place in various provinces.

articles.title: Poster Show Opens
articles.content:
Poster Show Opens
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- A show of posters calling for thoroughly implementing the militant tasks set forth in the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK's leading newspapers opened at the Pyongyang International Cultural Centre Wednesday. 
					 Put on display are at least 80 posters reflecting the idea and spirit of the joint editorial. They were created by artists of the Mansudae Art Studio, Pyongyang University of Fine Art, the Korean Central Fine Arts Studio and the Fine Art Studio of the Ministry of Railways. 
					
					 The posters strongly appeal to all the army and people to dynamically conduct a general offensive to improve people's standard of living in hearty response to the noble intention of General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il and thus glorify this year marking the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea as a year of prosperity filled with happiness of the people. 
					
					 Posters including "Let us thoroughly implement the militant tasks set forth in the joint editorial for this year!" and "World, look at us!" vividly show the firm faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK determined to demonstrate the dignity and invincible might of Kim Il Sung's Korea to the world. 
					
					 There are also posters "Let us bring about a radical turn in the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again!" "Let us effect a drive to produce more daily necessities!" and "Let us radically increase agricultural production!"
					
					 Posters such as "Let us increase production capacity of Juche steel!" "Let us send more freights to all fronts at faster speed!" and "Let us extend the scope of introduction of the CNC technology in the sector of machine-building industry!" vividly reflect tasks facing several domains of the national economy. 
					
					 Also there are such posters of diverse themes as "Let us achieve the reunification of the country through the unity of the whole nation!" and "Leap higher and faster towards the world!"

articles.title: Gift from Jordan King
articles.content:
Gift from Jordan King
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Abdullah II, King of Jordan, on the occasion of the New Year.
					 It was conveyed to an official of the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Tuesday.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Cuba
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Cuba
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Havana gave a reception on Jan. 8 to mark the 51st anniversary of the victorious Cuban revolution.
					 Present there on invitation were Jorge Marti Martinez, head of the International Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, and Oscar Martinez, its deputy head, Marcos Rodriguez, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Pedro Mendiondo Gomez, commander of the Air and Anti-Aircraft Defense Forces of the Revolutionary Armed Forces, and other party, state and army officials of Cuba.
					
					 The ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy were on hand.

articles.title: WPK Pursuing People's Living First Policy
articles.content:
WPK Pursuing People's Living First Policy
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- "Bring about a radical turn in the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again this year that marks the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea!" -- This is the main slogan for this year put forward by the WPK through the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK's leading newspapers.
					 The slogan reflects the people-oriented policy of the WPK, which regards it as the overriding principle in its activities to improve the people's living steadily.
					
					 The WPK, which is called by the people the maternal Party taking full responsibility for their destiny and future and taking care of them to the last, has set forth profound and clear-cut slogans representing the will and desire of the masses in each period and stage of the developing revolution in order to advance the revolution and construction without letup.
					
					 It is all for an independent life and happiness of the people that the WPK has firmly defended Korean-style socialism under the banner of Songun and set a great goal of building a great, prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Mirrored in the slogans "We serve the people!" and "All for improving the people's living standard!" is the unshakable political creed of the Party.
					
					 The WPK's policy of giving priority to the people's living has made such good results as modern light industry factories and stockbreeding bases built throughout the country, farms that have made a good job in grain production and fish farms based on the latest science and technology.
					
					 All the events that have taken place in the DPRK encourage the people with hope and confidence that they will surely live a happy life in a rich and powerful country.
					
					 The Korean people are now waging a vigorous campaign for improving the people's living standard by making the utmost use of all foundations and potentials of the country provided under the leadership of the Party in spite of difficulties.

articles.title: Japans' Ambition to Grab Tok Islets Flailed
articles.content:
Japans' Ambition to Grab Tok Islets Flailed
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- A few days ago, the Japanese minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology let loose a spate of balderdash that Tok Islets "belong to Japan." Earlier, the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan issued an "instruction manual containing high school curriculum guidelines" for geography and history studies which assert that the above-said islets are part of the territory of Japan.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Such brazen-faced and blatant claim to Tok Islets is a wanton infringement upon the dignity and sovereignty of the Korean nation.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries continue making far-fetched assertion that Tok Islets belong to Japan, disregarding the fact indisputably proved and universally recognized. This is prompted by their criminal scenario to realize the ambition to stage a comeback to Korea.
					
					 Japan is hell-bent on the moves to realize the above-said wild ambition as evidenced by its distortion of history, its scenario to grab other's territory and revival of militarism, etc., pursuant to its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The above-mentioned instruction manual issued recently by the Japanese reactionaries goes to clearly prove that the Japan's moves to grab other's territory have reached an evermore undisguised and graver phase as the above-said action is a very dangerous development prompted by a sinister scenario to infuse the zeal to seize Tok Islets into the young Japanese and thus hurl them into the reinvasion of Korea.
					
					 No matter what far-fetched assertion and crafty artifice the Japanese reactionaries may resort to, they can never deprive Korea of its dominium over Tok Islets.
					
					 They had better behave themselves, bearing in mind the above-said wild ambition can never come true.

articles.title: Negotiated Settlement of Disputes Called for
articles.content:
Negotiated Settlement of Disputes Called for
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The dispute-torn countries should settle disputes through dialogues and negotiations in line with their national interests and the human cause of peace.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					Today the settlement of disputes presents itself as an important matter of international politics and an urgent task of the times whose implementation brooks no further delay. 
					
					There may be diverse methods for solving international disputes but what is essential is for the parties involved in disputes to sit at a negotiating table and seek a proper principle and methodology for settling issues and put them into practice. 
					
					The basic source of the present international disputes threatening peace and security in regions and the world lies in wrong ideas and policies of looking down upon other countries and nations and slighting them, doing harm to their interests and seeking one's own interests.
					
					In order to settle disputes it is necessary to take vigilance against the imperialists' divide-and alienate-strategy and never allow them to fish in troubled waters.
					
					In order to prevent disputes from occurring it is also important for countries and nations not to accept a political mode not suited to their traditions and specific conditions.
					
					The international bodies including the UN should deal with disputes on the principle of impartiality.
					
					The present unequal international economic order established by the imperialists is stoking the contradictions and confrontation among countries. The daily widening worldwide gap between the rich and the poor and the disparity in the level of social development are one of the sources of disputes.
					
					The people aspiring after independence and peace should wage a dynamic struggle to build a fresh international economic order, bearing in mind that the elimination of the old international economic order is not a mere economic and business-like matter but a political issue of settling serious international disputes.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Supported
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial Supported
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Personages of different countries expressed support for the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					 Jaroslav Kafka, chairman of the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, at a seminar on Jan. 7 fully supported the joint New Year editorial that correctly reflected the Korean people's aspiration after building a thriving nation and the stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to reunify the country and contribute to ensuring global peace and stability.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, in a statement on Jan. 6 called upon the government, political parties, organizations and people of Sweden to extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts to carry out the tasks set forth in the joint editorial.
					
					 The chairman of the Indonesian Maritime Transport Trade Union said in a statement on Jan. 4 that "Let the entire nation unite under the banner of north-south joint declarations and achieve national reunification at the earliest date!", a slogan set forth in the joint editorial, is the most reasonable and practical slogan for Korea's reunification at present.
					
					 The statement expressed belief that the reunification of Korea, the cherished desire of the nation, would be certainly realized when all the Korean people vigorously advance along the road of independent reunification under the uplifted banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Koreans in China Called for Effecting Turn in Patriotic Work
articles.content:
Koreans in China Called for Effecting Turn in Patriotic Work
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on Jan. 5 calling for bringing about a new turn in the patriotic work for national reunification this meaningful year.
					 The statement said that all Koreans in China should turn out as one in the sacred struggle for national reunification under the slogan "Let the entire nation unite under the banner of north-south joint declarations and achieve national reunification at the earliest date!"
					
					 The association will more firmly build up itself in keeping with the requirements of the developing era true to General Secretary Kim Jong Il's idea of Songun revolution and idea of overseas compatriots movement and arouse all Koreans in China to the patriotic drive for building a thriving nation this year, too, it said.
					
					 It stressed that the association would further strengthen the solidarity and alliance with all the reunification movement organizations at home and abroad this meaningful year marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and thus resolutely defend and implement the historic inter-Korean declarations while meeting all sorts of challenges of the separatist forces.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Celebrated by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Celebrated by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the General Association of Koreans in China was inaugurated on Dec. 29 last year to celebrate February 16, birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Choe Un Bok, chairperson of the association, was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold such colorful events as a celebration meeting, a book and photo exhibition, a film show and an art performance on the occasion of the February holiday.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- It was in September Juche 36 (1947) that anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk was staying in Kyongsong County, North Hamgyong Province.
					 One day she, together with officials of the county, climbed a mountain deep along a ravine to pick wild grapes and other wild fruits. She asked the officials how many people had frequented the mountain to pick such wild fruits.
					
					 They replied that most of the peasants, so busy with farming, had found no spare time to climb deep mountains so that they had usually gathered wild fruits at the foot of nearby mountains.
					
					 Saying that mountain people should take a measure for making a proper use of mountains, she gave advice to the officials to gather wild fruits abundant in the area in time to make wine and various foodstuffs for peasants and towns.
					
					 She said President Kim Il Sung had been concerned about the people's living which had not yet been bettered even after the liberation of the country. She then quoted him as saying that the country's natural resources should be fully utilized in order to improve the people's living as early as possible.
					
					 She also said when the people in mountain villages did both farming and sidelines well as the President taught, they could enhance their living standard soon.
					
					 Listening to what she said, the officials realized the reason why she climbed the high and rugged mountain.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno nueva granja porcina
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno nueva granja porcina
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la granja porcina nuevamente construida por la gran unidad combinada 313 del EPC.
					La granja, que tiene computarizados todos sus procesos desde la elaboracion de pienso, el suministro de este y agua, el control de la temperatura y humedad de pocilgas, etc., produce ahora mucha cantidad de carne y sus articulos elaborados contribuyendo grandemente a la mejora de la vida alimentaria de los militares.
					
					Luego de escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de la granja, el Dirigente recorrio el interior y exterior de esta planta construida agradablemente informandose en detalles de la situacion de su construccion, administracion y operacion.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que la unidad haya edificado magnificamente con sus propias fuerzas esta moderna granja porcina, evaluo altamente los meritos de los constructores militares.
					
					Averiguo de manera pormenorizada el estado de equipos tecnicos y de cria y cuidado pasando revista a varios lugares como las pocilgas, el taller de procesamiento de pienso y el de carne.
					
					Volvio a ponerse muy contento de que los empleados de la granja abastecieran a los militares de los articulos de carne elaborados de diversos generos y de buena calidad, hechos con los derivados recogidos del todo, y reconocio los esfuerzos de aquellos.
					
					Los uniformados del EPC, infinitamente fieles al partido y la revolucion, hacen un enorme aporte a la construccion de una patria prospera levantando por doquier numerosas creaciones de la epoca del Songun bajo la consigna "!Nos encarguemos tanto de la defensa de la patria como de la construccion del socialismo!", apunto y anadio que las proezas acumuladas por el EPC se transmitiran eternamente junto con la historia de construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para la administracion y la operacion de la granja.
					
					Subrayo que las granjas porcinas recien edificadas fueron disenadas materializando estrictamente el principio cientifico y son modernas y utiles bases ganaderas que se apoyan en la solida fuente de pienso y agrego que ellas constituyen la firme garantia del incremento trascendental de la produccion ganadera.
					
					Para producir mucho mas carne en esta granja, es preciso establecer perfectamente el cientifico sistema administrativo basado en la tecnologia moderna, senalo y anadio que para ese fin, se deben asentar sobre la base cientifica la cria y el cuidado.
					
					Dado que tiene una importancia especial la prevencion veterinaria para aumentar la produccion ganadera, hay que disponer en la medida suficiente de las instalaciones preventivas e implantar un riguroso sistema profilactico, enseno.
					
					Hoy dia, en nuestro pais se ha sentado la solida base material y tecnica capaz de aumentar vertiginosamente la produccion de la carne de puerco, incluyendo el establecimiento del ordenado sistema genetico que puede producir y suministrar suficientemente los lechones de buena variedad, apunto y destaco que se debe impulsar en gran medida la cria de cerdos aprovechando esas condiciones favorables.
					
					Encomendo encarecidamente a todas las unidades que libren ampliamente la lucha por desarrollar aun mas la ganaderia a fin de facilitar una rica vida alimentaria a los preciosos soldados.
					
					Acompanaron en esta ocasion al Comandante Supremo los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia mensaje a los constructores de central de Huichon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia mensaje a los constructores de central de Huichon
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio el dia 7 un mensaje de agradecimiento especial a todos los constructores que muestran plenamente el impetu de la Corea del Songun en la edificacion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon.
					El Dirigente expreso en la misiva su agradecimiento sincero a todos los constructores que manifiestan a todo el mundo el impetu de la Corea del Songun registrando en esa obra grandes innovaciones y saltos. 
					
					El texto resumido del mensaje sigue abajo:
					
					La construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon es una sagrada lucha por materializar el legado del gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung y una gran obra de transformacion de la naturaleza que tiene mucha importancia en abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Emiti la orden de construir hasta el ano 2012, en que se cumplira el centenario del nacimiento del Lider paternal, la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon a fin de materializar el legado de el y fortalecer la base energetica del pais y tome las medidas revolucionarias para que todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo dieran buen impulso a la obra mediante la movilizacion general.
					
					Todos los constructores incluso los militares, quienes acudieron al campo de construccion recibiendo con sus corazones palpitantes la orden del Comandante Supremo, dieron firmes perspectivas de terminar dentro de 2-3 anos esa colosal obra, que antes requeria mas de 10 anos, manifestando plenamente el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y el de la lucha tenaz.
					
					Los funcionarios y otros trabajadores de las unidades relacionadas, conscientes de la importancia y el significado de la obra, produjeron y suministraron a tiempo con toda responsabilidad los materiales y equipos necesarios contribuyendo asi activamente a la aceleracion de la obra. 
					
					Es muy loable que ahora los familiares de los militares realizaran activamente la agitacion economica y los trabajos voluntarios en el campo de construccion integrando los equipos formados para estas actividades y que todo el partido, todo el pais y todo el pueblo ofrecieran un gran apoyo material y espiritual a la obra. He aqui el poderio de nuestro partido y la superioridad del socialismo a nuestro estilo. 
					
					Hoy dia, los minutos y los segundos que pasan en el campo de la citada obra son precisamente saltos e innovaciones, y la velocidad de construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon implica la nueva velocidad de Chollima de la epoca del Songun, basada en el espiritu revolucionario de los militares, o sea, la "velocidad de Huichon".
					
					Esta velocidad es la de la ofensiva y de la pelea de uno contra ciento del heroico Ejercito Popular de Corea, que conquista de manera relampagueante mediante la marcha forzada cualquier fortaleza "inexpugnable", enarbolando la bandera del Comandante Supremo. Ademas, es la velocidad de unidad monolitica entre todos los militares y civiles que avanzan ajustando las palpitaciones de corazon y los pasos a la marcha forzada de la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					Igualmente, es la velocidad de gran marcha y grandes saltos de la Corea del Songun que avanza de viento en popa hacia la gran potencia prospera acortando el siglo. 
					
					Recorriendo el campo de construccion de la citada Central, volvi a ver claramente el impetu del heroico EPC y de Corea e hice mas ferrea mi conviccion de que es definitiva la victoria de la gran causa por la construccion de la gran potencia prospera si se cuenta con el ejercito y el pueblo con tal temperamento revolucionario.
					
					Estoy muy contento de que partiendo de su infinita fidelidad al partido y la revolucion y calido patriotismo, todos los uniformados y constructores, participantes en la obra, estimularan activamente a todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo a la unica senda de gran auge marchando al frente de la gran causa por construir una gran potencia prospera con la "velocidad de Huichon", nueva velocidad de Chollima, y evaluo altamente las proezas heroicas de los camaradas.
					
					Terminar a toda costa la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon hasta el 2012 en que se cumplira el centenario del natalicio del gran Lider, camarada  Kim Il Sung es la inconmovible decision y voluntad de nuestro partido.
					
					Aunque es una tarea muy dificil y enorme levantar dentro de 2-3 anos esa central de gran tamano, mientras existen inagotables fuerzas del ejercito y el pueblo, unidos monoliticamente en torno al partido, y la poderosa base de la industria del Juche, es del todo posible cumplirla en el plazo previsto si todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo libran una gran ofensiva.
					
					Estoy muy convencido de que todos los oficiales y soldados y los constructores participantes en la obra abriran antes que nadie las puertas a la gran potencia prospera al cumplir a costa de la vida la orden del Comandante Supremo de culminarla hasta 2012.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion militar del Norte advierte a autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion militar del Norte advierte a autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ATCC) -- Con respecto a que las autoridades surcoreanas se enfrascan en el lanzamiento de los volantes que censuran a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y fomentan la desconfianza y la confrontacion entre los connacionales, el jefe de la delegacion de la parte Norte a las conversaciones de expertos militares Norte-Sur de Corea envio el dia 13 a las autoridades militares de la parte Sur el siguiente aviso: 
					El 31 de octubre del ano pasado, al senalar el esparcimiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC por parte de las autoridades surcoreanas que se ampliaba cada dia mas, nuestra parte ha advertido solemnemente que si aquellas no toman necesarios remedios, las relaciones intercoreanas sufriran inesperadas consecuencias negativas.
					
					Sin embargo, a finales del ano pasado y a principios del presente, las autoridades surcoreanas regaron volantes utilizando globos esfericos sobre nuestra parte como las zonas de los distritos de Kimhwa y Jangphung, la Zona Turistica del monte Kumgang, etc.
					
					En particular, el primero de enero, partiendo de su rabia anti-RPDC, la "Alianza del pueblo para enviar volantes al Norte", compuesta por las entidades conservadoras ultraderechistas del Sur de Corea, mando por aire a nuestra parte cientos de miles de volantes desde el Pabellon Rimjin de la ciudad de Phaju de la provincia de Kyonggi.
					
					Nuestra parte se ve obligada a tomar por graves el provocativo lanzamiento de volantes y otras locuras anti-RPDC de las autoridades surcoreanas que de frente a frente, hablan del "dialogo" y la "mejora de las relaciones" y, a las espaldas, llevan estos vinculos a la fase de confrontacion.
					
					Aunque es muy preciosa y apremiante la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas, nuestro ejercito no perdonara ni en lo minimo los casos de que mancharan la absoluta autoridad de nuestra Direccion  y la dignidad de la patria socialista.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben reconocer que el lanzamiento de volantes anti-RPDC es un abierto acto de anulacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y un gran crimen traidor que contraviene a la exigencia de la epoca y la aspiracion nacional.
					
					Y han de tomar la medida de disolver de inmediato las entidades conservadoras ultraderechistas que cometieron tales actos y castigar severamente a sus cabecillas. 
					
					Seran condenados duro por la nacion los divisionistas internos y externos que desafian a la historia.

articles.title: Se efectuara en Pyongyang el XIV Festival de Kimjongilias
articles.content:
Se efectuara en Pyongyang el XIV Festival de Kimjongilias
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il tendra lugar en esta capital el XIV Festival de Kimjongilias en la Exhibicion Permanente de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia desde la segunda decena de febrero del 99 (2010) de la Era Juche.
					En el certamen participaran los organismos de las fuerzas armadas, ministerios, organos centrales, militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares,  entidades de coreanos y compatriotas residentes en ultramar, asi como amigos extranjeros.
					
					Tambien en todas las provincias se realizaran las exposiciones de dichas flores y la visita a los invernaderos de kimilsungias y kimjongilias.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia ambicion de Japon de usurpar el islote Tok
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia ambicion de Japon de usurpar el islote Tok
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el ministro de Educacion, Cultura, Deporte, Ciencia y Tecnologia de Japon dijo que el islote Tok es el "territorio propio de Japon".
					Con anterioridad, el Ministerio de Educacion, Cultura, Deporte, Ciencia y Tecnologia de Japon dio a la publicidad la "guia de instruccion" de nuevos manuales de geografia y de historia de las escuelas superiores, en la cual se explica que el islote Tok es el territorio japones.
					
					Tal insistencia descarada y abierta deviene una violacion brutal a la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion coreana, senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido en su edicion de este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					Al ignorar el hecho ya confirmado irrefutablemente y reconocido en lo internacional, los reaccionarios japoneses siguen insistiendo persistentemente en que el islote Tok es el "territorio propio de Japon", lo que se debe a su intencion criminal de realizar su ambicion de nueva agresion a Corea. 
					
					Japon se aferra a la politica de hostilidad a Corea desarrollando freneticamente las maniobras tendentes a realizar su ambicion de nueva agresion, entre otras, la tergiversacion de la historia, la usurpacion del territorio y el resurgimiento de militarismo. 
					
					 La publicacion de la citada "guia de instruccion", siendo un acto muy peligroso que parte de la intencion siniestra de los reaccionarios japoneses de inculcar a sus nuevas generaciones la conciencia de usurpar el islote Tok y lanzarlas a la nueva agresion a Corea, muestra fehacientemente que tal tejemaneje llega a la etapa mas abierta y grave. 
					
					Aunque los reaccionarios japoneses se valen de todas las persistencias y artimanas astutas, no pueden arrebatar a nuestro pais el derecho a la posesion del islote Tok.
					
					Ellos deben actuar con prudencia al tener presente que su ambicion de usurparlo es una ilusion vana nunca realizable.
